Edit division summary

Improve the summary of what was voted on in this division.

Accurate, informed summaries draw on the debate leading up to the division and our research guide. It’s also helpful to include links to the legislation, reports and other resources you find so that readers can dive in further if they wish.

Clear and succinct summaries are best. Use our style guide to write something that everyone can understand.

Cancel

Useful links for you to research

  • Bills before Parliament
  • Current House Committee Inquiries
  • Current Senate Committee Inquiries
  • House Powers, Practice and Procedure
  • Senate Powers, Practice and Procedure
  • House Official Hansard
  • Senate Official Hansard

Formatting codes. You can use the following to mark paragraphs, lists and so on.

  • ''italic'' - italic
  • [http://example.com A link] - link
  • * A point - bulleted list item
  • An idea[1] - link to a footnote
  • * [1] Ideas are good - footnote
  • @A comment - comments aren't displayed
  • @MP voted aye to say that little ponies are great - puts this text on the motion page "[MP Name] voted to say that little ponies are great"
  • @MP voted no - does it for MPs that voted no
